name: M.E.T.A (Demo)
description:
Demo for on hold proyect.

You're dummy doe, a player character inside a video game in development and have become aware of yourself. You'll try to escape outside the game and onto the depths of your developer PC until you can true freedom.

GDD for reference.

Design and development - Alejandro Pulio

Art and Design - Amalia Martínez

Movement - WASD

Sprint - Shift

Jump - Spacebar

Mouse cursor movement - Left Click

Shoot bugs/Interact with mouse cursor - Right Click
